title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.197 - Maintenance
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.197 - Maintenance

State Regulations

Effort expended to maintain assets in fit condition to do
their work--such items are ordinary and recurring and do not improve the asset
or add to its life. A useful distinction can be made between maintenance as
preventive and repairs as curative. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
441.197

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
